title: Regulating Large Financial Institutions
content: For release on delivery   9:00 a.m. EDT   April 17, 2013          Regulating Large Financial Institutions      Remarks by    Jeremy C. Stein    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System      at      “Rethinking Macro Policy II”   a conference sponsored by the International Monetary Fund      Washington, D.C.         April 17, 2013
